about.title: About me
about.p1: Software developer with over 7 years of experience working at the intersection of backend development and data science. My approach is based on three pillars: designing scalable architectures, maintaining clear documentation, and, above all, measuring the real impact of every feature in production.
about.p2: I have worked on developing high-concurrency APIs and Machine Learning projects, primarily using Python, Java, and TypeScript. I firmly believe that the value of code lies not just in its execution, but in its ability to generate insights and solve complex problems efficiently.
about.p3: As an entrepreneur, I co-founded Conectándote (https://conectandote.com.uy/), a platform in Uruguay that connects students with educational opportunities; and, through my blog @Data For Everyone, I spread best practices and learnings in Data Science.

description: Leading the technical development and architecture of a platform connecting students with educational opportunities in Uruguay.
Orchestrated a scalable infrastructure on AWS and developed core features for the platform.
Created a Python MCP that streamlined internal development workflows using proprietary libraries.
Developed a product index to detect items with high improvement potential.
Automated 15+ recurring manual processes with n8n + BigQuery + internal APIs, freeing up ~200 monthly hours for the Catalog team and improving SLA compliance.
Delivered several technical talks on AI, backend, and data at internal conferences, with a total audience of ~250 developers.
Designed a non-compliant image detection system that removed 200,000+ vendor images.
Optimized BigQuery pipelines, reducing execution times and saving over 80,000 USD in costs.
Built dashboards that reduced product prioritization time by 40%.
Designed and implemented abstraction layers in Java to accelerate the integration of generative AI capabilities.
Developed a duplicate image detection system with OpenCLIP, processing 150,000+ RPM and improving matching accuracy by 30%.
Improved catalog quality metrics by 22% through data solutions.
Built automated reports used by more than 50 business stakeholders.
Collaborated with the Search team to improve product ranking relevance, reducing low-quality results and increasing CTR by 8% in key categories.
Developed core modules for a mobile banking application in React Native used by 30,000+ customers.
Implemented responsive UI components together with the UX team.
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers.
Developed and maintained home banking platforms for three leading financial institutions in LATAM.
